description:
• What you’ll find below is a 100% free and no strings attached video course (with 10 videos) … that contains the simple webinar system that allowed LeadPages™ to grow from zero to 25,000 customers in under 2 years!
  • You'll get simple, step-by-step instructions on how to create an evergreen webinar model you can rinse and repeat for your business (without any of the hassles you might expect).
  • You'll get behind-the-scenes access to the entire marketing strategy we use at LeadPages™ (and of course explanations on how to borrow this exact webinar system).

This course is designed for the small business owner, entrepreneur, coach, or service provider who wants to spend more of their time on serving their customers than on marketing.
title: Create A Webinar Sales Funnel With LeadPages
